original_title: Mis peores amigos: Promedio rojo el regreso
overview: As developmentally disabled Papitas nears death, his wish is to have his best friends help him fulfill his bucket list, a list that includes seeing a leprechaun and traveling to the future. What could possibly go wrong for these best worst friends?
tagline: When there's a will, there's always friends.
title: Best Worst Friends
